snippet: The priests were among 26 who were suspended early last year because of accusations of sexual abuse or improper sexual behavior.
abstract: Roman Catholic Archbishop Charles J Chaput of Philadelphia announces that five priests under investigation for sexual abuse will be defrocked, while three other priests have been exonerated; priests are among 26 who were suspended in 2011 because of past accusations of sexual abuse or improper sexual behavior.
lead_paragraph: The priests were among 26 who were suspended early last year because of accusations of sexual abuse or improper sexual behavior.

headline.main: 5 Philadelphia Priests Are Barred From Ministry
headline.print_headline: 5 Philadelphia Priests Are Defrocked in Abuse Inquiry

keywords.value: Survivors Network of Those Abused by Priests
keywords.name: organizations
